CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSC (Polymer Solar Cell)
2. J91 (a material or component, possibly a type of electrode)
3. m-ITIC (a material or component, possibly a type of electrode)
4. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
5. J sc (Short Circuit Current)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PSC (Polymer Solar Cell)
2. m-ITIC (m-ITIC, which stands for "mixed-ion interfacial layer composite")

The other entities in the paragraph (e.g. "J91") do not refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSC |
| m-ITIC |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSC (Photovoltaic Solar Cell)
2. J91 (a reference or standard)
3. m-ITIC (a material or component)
4. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
5. J sc (Short Circuit Current)

So, the entities in the paragraph that correspond to the "Property Name" category are:

1. PSC (Photovoltaic Solar Cell)
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
3. J sc (Short Circuit Current)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. PSC (Photovoltaic Solar Cell)
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
3. J sc (Short Circuit Current)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Properties. The other entities, such as "J91" and "m-ITIC", do not refer to Material Properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSC (Photovoltaic Solar Cell) |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| J sc (Short Circuit Current) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - The value of 11.63% represents the efficiency with which the solar cell converts sunlight into electrical energy.
2. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage) - The value of 0.98 V represents the maximum voltage that the solar cell can achieve when it is not connected to an external load.
3. J sc (Short-Circuit Current) - The value of 18.03 mA cm^-2 represents the maximum current that the solar cell can supply when it is connected to an external load.

Therefore, the three "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE (11.63%)
2. V oc (0.98 V)
3. J sc (18.03 mA cm^-2)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - The value of 11.63% represents the efficiency with which the solar cell converts sunlight into electrical energy.

Therefore, the only entity that refers to the value of a material property in the given paragraph is:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - 11.63%

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 11.63% |
| 0.98 V |
| 18.03 mA cm^-2 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
